changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.description: Full release history of the prokodo CLI ‚Äî what changed in every version, with links to GitHub diffs.

ci-cd.title: CI / CD Integration
ci-cd.description: Integrate the prokodo CLI into CI/CD pipelines ‚Äî GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, environment variable setup, and best practices.

commands/auth.title: auth
commands/auth.description: Manage your prokodo API key with the auth command ‚Äî login, logout, and status sub-commands explained.

commands/credits.title: credits
commands/credits.description: Check your current prokodo credit balance and usage history with the prokodo credits command.

commands/doctor.title: doctor
commands/doctor.description: Diagnose your local prokodo setup with prokodo doctor ‚Äî checks Node version, credentials, config, and connectivity.

commands/init.title: init
commands/init.description: Initialize a prokodo project configuration with prokodo init ‚Äî creates .prokodo/config.json in your project.

commands/overview.title: Command Overview
commands/overview.description: Complete reference overview of all prokodo CLI commands ‚Äî auth, init, verify, credits, and doctor.

commands/verify.title: verify
commands/verify.description: Upload project files and trigger a cloud verification run with prokodo verify ‚Äî flags, exit codes, and JSON output.

configuration.title: Configuration
configuration.description: Configure the prokodo CLI per-project using .prokodo/config.json ‚Äî all supported fields, types, and default values.

getting-started/installation.title: Installation
getting-started/installation.description: Install the prokodo CLI globally via npm, pnpm, or yarn. System requirements, package manager commands, and verification steps.

getting-started/quick-start.title: Quick Start
getting-started/quick-start.description: Get from zero to a successful cloud verification in under five minutes with the prokodo CLI quick-start guide.

global-options.title: Global Options
global-options.description: Global CLI flags available on every prokodo command ‚Äî API key, timeout, JSON mode, verbose output, and color control.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Official documentation for the prokodo CLI ‚Äî authenticate, configure, verify and manage your prokodo projects directly from the terminal.

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.description: Fix common prokodo CLI errors ‚Äî missing API key, invalid config, timeout exceeded, permissions, and node version issues.

versions.title: Versions & Release Policy
versions.description: Version history, npm release cadence, and upgrade instructions for the prokodo CLI.
